  • Events
    • INDYCAR: Indianapolis 500 pres. by Gainbridge
      • INDYCAR: 106th Running of the Indianapolis 500 presented by Gainbridge 500 miles. 200 laps. 33 drivers, and one ice cold bottle of milk. The only thing missing from this magical Indianapolis 500 presented by Gainbridge mix is you! Don’t miss another incredible edition of “The Greatest Spectacle in Racing” Sunday, May 29. Learn More 2022 Tickets
    • INDYCAR: GMR Grand Prix (May)
      • INDYCAR: GMR Grand Prix The Month of May shifts into gear May 13-14 as the stars of the NTT INDYCAR SERIES take on the action-packed IMS road course for the GMR Grand Prix. This family-friendly event will get you closer than ever to the twists and turns of the 14-turn, 2.439-mile track. Don’t miss your favorite athletes as they aim to be the first to conquer the legendary Brickyard in 2022! Learn More 2022 Tickets
    • NASCAR Cup: Verizon 200 at the Brickyard
      • 29 Jul 31 Jul
        NASCAR: Verizon 200 at the Brickyard See a new chapter of NASCAR history unfold Sunday, July 31! The NASCAR Cup Series will take on the thrilling 14-turn, 2.439-mile IMS road course on a race weekend steeped in IMS heritage. NASCAR’s best will lay it all on the line to become the next NASCAR Cup Series winner on the IMS road course. Who will it be? Learn More 2022 Tickets
    • INDYCAR: Big Machine Spiked Coolers GP (July)
      • 29 Jul 30 Jul
        INDYCAR: Big Machine Spiked Coolers GP Let’s run it back! INDYCAR road course racing brings so much action that we’re doing it twice in 2022. The stars of the NTT INDYCAR SERIES will return to the Racing Capital of the World Saturday, July 30 for the Big Machine Spiked Coolers GP on the 14-turn, 2.439-mile IMS road course. Don’t miss this one-of-a-kind, marquee weekend! Learn More 2022 Tickets
    • NASCAR Xfinity: Pennzoil 150 at the Brickyard
      • 29 Jul 30 Jul
        NASCAR: 2022 Xfinity Series Two times the action. Two times the excitement. All in one day. Be there as the NTT INDYCAR SERIES and the NASCAR Xfinity Series share the thrilling 14-turn, 2.439-mile IMS road course Saturday, July 30, offering you more single-day action than ever before at the Racing Capital of the World! Learn More 2022 Tickets
    • Concert: Indy 500 Snake Pit
      • 29 May 29 May
        Indy 500 Snake Pit presented by Coors Light The Indy 500 Snake Pit presented by Coors Light is the ultimate festival of fun, friends and some of the biggest electronic music acts in the world – all while Indy cars roar past at 230 mph. The Snake Pit is the perfect start of a sizzling summer, and you know you don’t want to miss it. Learn More Buy Tickets
    • USAC: Driven2SaveLives BC39
      • 3 Aug 4 Aug
        USAC: Driven2SaveLives BC39 powered by NOS Energy Drink The Brickyard weekend has evolved into a weeklong celebration of motorsports and America with constant side-by-side action, and it all finishes with the thrilling Driven2SaveLives BC39 Powered by NOS Energy Drink at The Dirt Track at IMS. Some of the best short-track racers will battle with NASCAR and INDYCAR stars in one of the richest USAC National Midget National Championship races. You won’t want to miss either night of grassroots racing at the Racing Capital of the World! Learn More Buy Tickets
    • SVRA: Brickyard Vintage Racing Invitational
      • 18 Jun 19 Jun
        Brickyard Vintage Racing Invitational The pedigree of the Brickyard Vintage Racing Invitational June 18-19 at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway is elite, for both machines and drivers. More than 300 of the world’s most exceptional vintage race cars will compete in 12 different Sportscar Vintage Racing Association (SVRA) classes on the 14-turn, 2.439-mile road course at IMS. Learn More Buy Tickets
    • GT: Indianapolis 8 Hour
      • 7 Oct 9 Oct
        Intercontinental GT: Indianapolis 8 Hour The Indianapolis Motor Speedway will host the Intercontinental GT Challenge Powered by Pirelli sports car championship Oct. 7-9, in conjunction with its North American series, GT World Challenge America. Learn More 2021 Race Recap

  • News
    • Latest News
      • Dixon Tops 227 To Pace First Day Of Indy 500 Open Test Six-time NTT INDYCAR SERIES champion Scott Dixon led the first day of the Indianapolis 500 Open Test on Wednesday at Indianapolis Motor Speedway, as drivers and teams began preparation for “The Greatest Spectacle in Racing.” Read More
        Indy 500 Prep Gears Up with Open Test This Week at IMS The two-day Indy 500 Open Test Wednesday and Thursday features eight former winners of “The Greatest Spectacle in Racing,” with Juan Pablo Montoya and Takuma Sato joining Helio Castroneves as multi-time “500” winners. Read More
        Red Cross, INDYCAR, IMS To Install Free Smoke Alarms in Speedway Volunteers, members of the American Red Cross-Indiana Region and INDYCAR/Indianapolis Motor Speedway staff and selected NTT INDYCAR SERIES drivers will install free smoke alarms for families in Speedway, Indiana, vulnerable to home fires during a “Sound the Alarm” event on Saturday, April 23. Read More

      • Castroneves Borg-Warner Trophy Sculpting Session Four-time Indianapolis 500 winner Helio Castroneves visited renowned sculptor Will Behrends for a sculpting session for his likeness that will grace the famed Borg-Warner Trophy. View Photos

    • Videos
      • Behind the Bricks: History of the Bronze Badge The coveted Bronze Badge dates back as far as 1912 at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway, and in its current form all the way back to 1947. On the latest episode of Behind the Bricks, Doug Boles ventures into the vault to find decades old, and even a century old, Bronze Badge to learn more about the history of these collector items. Watch Video
        Pennzoil Presents The Club Trailer Television coverage of the Month of May at Indianapolis Motor Speedway will shift into high gear Saturday, May 14 when NBC debuts “Pennzoil presents The Club,” a documentary featuring an exclusive conversation among one of the most elite groups in global motorsports -- the four drivers to win the Indianapolis 500 four times. Watch Video
        Behind The Bricks: Ryan Newman It's always special when a Hoosier wins at #IMS. As Ryan Newman explained to Doug Boles on Behind the Bricks, his 2013 #Brickyard400 win had added meaning as it came at a pivotal point in his #NASCAR career. Watch Video
